Below are the data sources utilised in this project:

| Datasets                                        | Source                                                                                                                                          |
|-------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Singapore Rental Flat Prices (Jan-17 to Sep-24) | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/datasets/d_c9f57187485a850908655db0e8cfe651/view)                                                             |
| Master Plan 2014 Subzone Boundary (Web)         | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/datasets/d_d14da225fccf921049ab64238ff473d9/view)                                                             |
| Hawker Centres Dataset                          | [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/datasets?formats=GEOJSON%7CKML%7CSHP%7CKMZ&sort=relevancy&page=1&resultId=d_4a086da0a5553be1d89383cd90d07ecd) |
| Kindergarten, Childcare, Primary School Dataset | [OneMap API](https://www.onemap.gov.sg/apidocs/)                                                                                                |
| Bus Stops Location, MRT/ LRT Locations          | [LTA Data Mall](https://datamall.lta.gov.sg/content/datamall/en/search_datasets.html)                                                           |
| Shopping Malls Coordinates                      | Through Wikipedia and webscraping with the coordinates retrieved through OneMap API                                                             |
